entities.name: george

entities.name: oliver
entities.description: Oliver's speech is known by heart by Fred and Harry.

entities.name: fred

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as a person who follows Fred and George out of the changing room.

entities.name: wood
entities.description: Wood is mentioned as a person who glares at others and says 'Or else'.

entities.name: madam hooch
entities.description: Madam Hooch is mentioned as the referee of the game.

entities.name: marcus flint
entities.description: Marcus Flint is mentioned as the Slytherin captain.

relationships.description: Wood is the leader of Gryffindor team.
Madam Hooch is refereeing for Slytherin team.
